name: Hoops Paradise PostLD
description:
This is the post 47th Ludum Dare version of our entry :

 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/hoops-paradise

This is still a work in progress, feedback is more than welcome !

Changelog :

  • The game is now left click only
  • Coolness is not an endgame factor anymore, but gives you up to 3 heal bonuses
  • Your boss will fire you only after 3 unanswered messages
  • Every 2 deaths on floor, your boss will give you more ambulance space (if you answer his text)
  • Chaos is gone, goodbye chaos
  • (soon to be fixed) It goes on forever as long as you answer your boss
  • There are a whole new bunch of visual and sound feedback
  • There is a proper intro
  • I have tweaked and tweaked again and am still tweaking the difficulty slope
